attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Downloading this app was the worst decision I have ever made in my life. It never even opens up!! Every time I try to use it, it crashes, my phone gets extremely hot and then shuts down. My battery life has significantly decreased since I have downloaded the app and attempted to use it. Furthermore, it has somehow used up 90% of my storage and causes the functioning on my phone to be severely delayed. Please protect your phone and DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!
